avoid-sensitive-topics-guideline: Steer clear of discussions involving politics, religion, or other sensitive and potentially divisive topics.
avoid-spam_caps-guideline: Refrain from spamming and using excessive capital letters in messages.
avoid-suspicious-activities-guideline: Stay clear of behaviors that can be perceived as scamming, including exploiting platform glitches or using alternative accounts.
chat-languages-guideline: Communicate in the designated language of the chat room.
follow-moderator-instructions-guideline: Comply with all instructions from moderators and staff. Non-compliance may lead to action against your chat privileges.
language-respect-guideline: Treat all users and staff with respect. Avoid harassment, insults, offensive language, or any form of discrimination.
mute-reason-placeholder: Please provide a reason for the ban, or choose from the preset options available below.
no-begging-or-soliciting-guideline: Do not ask for loans, tips, or any form of cryptocurrency from others.
no-trading-advertising-referrals-guideli: Avoid advertising, trading, selling, or buying goods/services, and refrain from sharing or advertising referral codes or external links (unless approved).
protect-personal-info-guideline: Do not share or ask for personal or identifying information from others.
respect-guideline: Treat all users and staff with respect. Avoid harassment, insults, offensive language, or any form of discrimination.
